content.text: A beauty salon in Taunton boasting over 25 years experience

Welcome  to Face & Figure beauty salon Taunton. Located in the south-west of  England, Face & Figure provides both beauty and personal  consultancy. Face & Figure prides itself on a friendly and caring  atmosphere, as well as some of the latest technology in beauty therapy  today.
The salon provides a wide  range of natural treatments, some that are exclusive to Face &  Figure around Taunton. Some which have achieved celebrity status.
Please feel free to look at the kind of advanced beauty therapy we provide in our Treatments page. If you are interested, please feel free to contact us on the Contact page for more information.

description.text: It is often the case that it is what we eat rather than how much that affects how we feel, and even how much weight is gained. Allergies are the body’s natural reaction to the wrong type of food or medicine. More subtle sensitivities, individual to us all, may not manifest themselves so obviously, but still leave us wondering why we feel lethargic or cannot seem to lose weight despite dieting. An allergy/sensitivity test can reveal which foods or substances may be causing health or weight problems. A range of remedies are available to treat most conditions. All cases are treated individually. Use the contact fields below to ask Face and Figure how we can treat you today.

description.text: Face and figure salon only invests  in high technology and  non-invasive facial treatments. We offer facials for acne, pigment,  peeling, wrinkles and toning (anti-aging). We were the first in to  introduce a non-surgical treatment around Taunton. One facial can reduce  the appearance by up to 5 years.
The light treatment is unique to us and can heal many conditions for the skin. It can also be used on the body for pain relief.
The Hollywood gold facial uses high frequency sound and RF properties to smooth the skin, it is wonderfully relaxing to have.

product_description.text: Still proven as a highly effective method of hair removal using thermolysis to treat individual hairs

Using high-frequency sound waves to destroy the follicle, a larger  area can be treated making the whole process faster. since no needles,  lasers, or electric current is used, there is a little sensation and no  risk of scarring or tissue damage

A homeopathic compound is administered to the skin and activated by a  soothing light ray (not laser). Highly effective and suitable for all  areas and skin types. A completely safe and pain free alternative to  laser.

Hairlight uses the latest and most advanced technology for the  treatment of hair loss and scalp disorders. A solution is applied to the  problem area and is activated by a patented light beam this stimulates  re-growth by removing blockages in sick tissue. Promoting the dilation  of blood vessels and increasing oxygen and nutrition to hair roots.  Results should be apparent within one month. Initially, two or three  treatments a week are required but the number of treatments reduces from  the third week.
